nodes.bodyText:
I guess the $(GDK_HOME) in this line is no longer needed.
(Edit) Still needed for older CUDA versions?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -60,10 +60,6 @@ ifdef ENABLE_GPU
         $(error You must set CUDA_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
     endif
 
-    ifeq (,$(GDK_HOME))
-        $(error You must set GDK_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
-    endif
-
     PRODUCT_INCLUDES+=$(CUDA_HOME)/include $(CUDA_HOME)/nvvm/include $(GDK_HOME)

nodes.bodyText: It's not a problem if GDK_HOME is empty.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -60,10 +60,6 @@ ifdef ENABLE_GPU
         $(error You must set CUDA_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
     endif
 
-    ifeq (,$(GDK_HOME))
-        $(error You must set GDK_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
-    endif
-
     PRODUCT_INCLUDES+=$(CUDA_HOME)/include $(CUDA_HOME)/nvvm/include $(GDK_HOME)

nodes.bodyText: Yes, it's still needed for versions 7.5 or older, in which case you'll get a compile error (if it's not set reasonably).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -60,10 +60,6 @@ ifdef ENABLE_GPU
         $(error You must set CUDA_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
     endif
 
-    ifeq (,$(GDK_HOME))
-        $(error You must set GDK_HOME if ENABLE_GPU is set)
-    endif
-
     PRODUCT_INCLUDES+=$(CUDA_HOME)/include $(CUDA_HOME)/nvvm/include $(GDK_HOME)
